• Multiplayer mining game using MQTT for real-time interactions
  • Procedurally generated underground environment with mining mechanics
  • Inventory management and upgradable vehicle systems
    const $ = id => document.getElementById(id);
    this.client = mqtt.connect(broker, options);

Mega Miner Online implements a multiplayer mining simulation where players navigate procedurally-generated underground environments. Core features include resource collection, character customization, and real-time collaboration/competition through MQTT-based networking. The persistent world supports temperature mechanics, vehicle upgrades, and an interactive shop economy.
